title: Library Renovation 2024
description: The main library was renovated with new shelves, reading areas, and study rooms for students.

title: Spirit Week: Crazy Socks & Twin Day
description: Students participated in Spirit Week with themed days like Crazy Socks Day and Twin Day to build school spirit.

title: Graduation Ceremony Class of 2022
description: The Class of 2022 celebrated their graduation with family and friends in the school auditorium.

title: Reading Marathon: Freedom Is a Book Away
description: Students participated in a reading marathon challenge to read as many pages as possible during the month.

title: Science Fair and Robotics Exhibition
description: Students presented science projects and basic robotics prototypes as part of the annual Science Fair.

title: Library Book Club: Mystery & Suspense
description: A monthly book club where students discussed mystery and suspense novels chosen by the librarian.
